import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './App.css'; class App extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", password: "", formErrors: { firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", password: "", } } } handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); if (formValid(this.state.formErrors)) { console.log(` Submitting First Name: ${this.state.firstName} lastName: ${this.state.lastName}, email: ${this.state.email}, password: ${this.state.password}, `) } } render() { return (

Create account

Already have an account
) } } export default App;
